headline: Dexcom shares up as Diabetes Association updates guidelines
summary: Investing.com -- DexCom Inc (NASDAQ:DXCM) shares up more than 2% following updated guidelines by the American Diabetes Association (ADA), which now recommend using continuous glucose monitors (CGMs) for some adults with type 2 diabetes who are not on insulin.

headline: DexCom: Brighter 2025 From Stelo Ramp
summary: DexCom faces challenges in 2024 due to competition and missteps, but the long-term outlook for continuous glucose monitors remains strong. Click here to read.
